name: Avoid PLC Copybook using GOTO statement  (PL1)
description: This rule searches for all PLC Copybook using the GO TO statement to manage the control flow.
output:
The report lists all the PLC Copybook having GOTO statement.

It provides following information: 
- PLC Copybook full name
rationale: Using Goto code breaks the process execution flow and makes the code more difficult to understand and maintain
remediation: Try to reduce the number of GO TO and when it is possible replace it with alternative statements.
alternativeName: Avoid PLC Copybook using GOTO statement  (PL1)

CWE-1075: Unconditional Control Flow Transfer outside of Switch Block

qualityStandards.name: Control Flow Transfer Control Element outside Switch Block
qualityStandards.description:
Objective
Avoid the unconditional transfer of control flow outside of switch structures

Consequence
Software that does not follow the principles of structured programming degrades comprehensibility

Measure Element
Number of instances where an unconditional transfer of control is located outside the branching based on the value of a storable element

qualityStandards.name: Unconditional Control Flow Transfer outside of Switch Block
qualityStandards.description: The software performs unconditional control transfer (such as a goto) in code outside of a branching structure such as a switch block.
